sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: At this time, Biothera does not provide access to individual patient data due to the study protocol's requirements for patient privacy and confidentiality. Only regulatory authorities and Biothera may have access to individual patient data. All data generated (by treatment group) or analyzed during this study are included in this published article.
